CustomField.formula: IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(CategoryContract__c,"МО"), ISPICKVAL(CategoryContract__c,"У")), ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"Agreement Terms and Conditions"),Duration_work_Opp__c >= 6),1, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(CategoryContract__c,"О"), ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"Agreement Terms and Conditions"),Duration_work_Opp__c >= 8),1, 0))
CustomField.label: Delinquency 0 6
